description:
A careless man meets his double.  A beheaded priest statue saves a life. A bully loses a hood and is tormented by terrible visions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Careless Soukurou / The Decapitated Priest Statue / Genji and the Hood
Sosou no Soukurou / Kubikiri Jizou / Genji to Zukin
そそうの相九郎 / 首切り地蔵 / 源次と頭巾
